title: Soil Profile
description: A cross-section of soil layers showing different strata. The top layer is dark and rich in organic material, followed by lighter layers with visible cracks and varying textures, indicating different soil compositions. The image captures the transition from topsoil to deeper layers, illustrating the complexity of soil structure.

title: Leyenda de Riesgos Naturales
description: Una leyenda que muestra diferentes símbolos relacionados con riesgos naturales. Incluye: 1. Anegamiento zonas endorreicas (líneas punteadas), 2. Movimientos de ladera (líneas con puntos), 3. Aludes (líneas diagonales azules), 4. Actividad sísmica (líneas horizontales), 5. Inundaciones costeras (líneas azules), 6. Tsunamis (líneas marrones), 7. Avenidas e inundaciones (líneas rojas).

title: Geological Hazard Map
description: A geological hazard map showing various risk zones. The map is color-coded to indicate different types of hazards such as landslides, seismic activity, coastal flooding, tsunamis, and flood-prone areas. The areas are marked with patterns and colors, including dotted lines for endorheic zones and shaded areas for landslide movements.

title: River Valley Landscape
description: An illustration depicting a river flowing through a valley surrounded by mountains. The landscape features green grass and trees on either side of the river, with steep rocky cliffs on one side and gentle slopes on the other.

title: Soil and Grass
description: The image shows a close-up view of soil with various rocks and pebbles, along with patches of grass growing above it. The soil appears dark and rich, while the grass is green and lush, indicating a natural landscape.
